trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of application-specific <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> instances used in combination with <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alkalmazás-specifikus számoknak <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> együtt példányok <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The PackageStore defines a reference collections of package that are open and active in the application.
trans-unit.target: A PackageStore egy referencia-gyűjtemények csomag, amely meg van nyitva, és az alkalmazás aktív határozza meg.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the PackageStore are accessed is by their key URI value.
trans-unit.target: A PackageStore hozzá csomagok érhető el van a kulcs URI-értékkel.

trans-unit.source: The PackageStore supports three common uses: 1.
trans-unit.target: A PackageStore három gyakori használati támogatja: 1.

trans-unit.source: Accessing <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> data through <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> Keresztül adatok</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> elérése

trans-unit.source: The application obtaining an instance of a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> given the package's URI.
trans-unit.target: Az alkalmazás egy példánya lehet beszerezni a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>megadva a csomag URI.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: Accessing packages that are created and stored in a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.
trans-unit.target: Csomagok létrehozása és a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>.</xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> tárolt elérése

trans-unit.source: To improve performance and minimize the overhead of repeated file open/close operations, the PackageStore is used to manage instances of packages accessed by <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> and directly by the application.
trans-unit.target: Jobb teljesítmény és ismételt fájl megnyitása vagy bezárása műveletek a költségek csökkentése, a PackageStore által elért csomagok példányai kezeléséhez használt <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>és az alkalmazás által közvetlenül.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>

trans-unit.source: When accessing data in a package, the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> address of a requested <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> is first checked to see if the package is already defined and open in the PackageStore.
trans-unit.target: A csomagban lévő adatok eléréséhez a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>címét a kért <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>először ellenőrzi, hogy ha a csomag már megadott és a PackageStore Megnyitás.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: If the package is defined as open in the PackageStore, requested parts can be accessed directly without repeatedly opening and closing the package for each request.
trans-unit.target: Ha a csomag a PackageStore nyitva van meghatározva, kért alkatrész közvetlenül nem szükséges ismételten megnyitása és bezárása a csomag az egyes kérelmek érhető el.

trans-unit.source: If your application opens a package with <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> can be called to add the package to the PackageStore.
trans-unit.target: Ha az alkalmazás számára <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>a csomag hozzáadása a PackageStore hívható.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> should later be called to remove the package from the PackageStore prior to calling <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>később hívható meg a csomag eltávolítása a PackageStore <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> hívása előtt</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>

trans-unit.source: XPS packages opened with an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically added and removed from the PackageStore when the document is created and disposed.
trans-unit.target: Az XPS-csomagok megnyitott egy <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor automatikusan felvétele, illetve a PackageStore eltávolítja, ha a dokumentum hozzák létre, és használaton.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: (You do not need to call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> separately for XPS packages opened with <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructors.) The file I/O permissions of a package accessed through the PackageStore remains the same as the I/O permissions set on the package when it is opened.
trans-unit.target: (Meghívásához nem kell <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>vagy <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A>külön-külön az XPS-csomagok megnyitott <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A>konstruktorok.)</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.RemovePackage%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> A fájl i/o engedélyeit a PackageStore keresztül érhetők el a csomag ugyanaz, mint a i/o-engedélyek a csomagra állítható be, ha meg van nyitva marad.

trans-unit.source: The PackageStore only provides references to the packages that have been added the store.
trans-unit.target: A PackageStore csak hivatkozások a csomagokat, amelyek hozzá vannak adva a tárolóban.

trans-unit.source: It is up to the application to correctly open, update, and close each package.
trans-unit.target: Az alkalmazás megfelelően nyissa meg a, frissítése, és zárja be az egyes csomagok esetén.

trans-unit.source: Packages added to the PackageStore can be accessed in multithreaded environments when they are used in combination with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] parser such as <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A PackageStore hozzá csomagok többszálú környezetek is elérhetők, és együttes használatakor egy [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> például elemző

trans-unit.source: When operating in a multithreaded environment, the application must lock the package before access.
trans-unit.target: Ha többszálas környezetben működik, az alkalmazás zárolni kell hozzáférés előtt a csomagot.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> to the store.
trans-unit.target: Hozzáad egy <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> hozzá a tárolóhoz.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` defines the package's key URI that is compared when you call <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`a csomag kulcs URI, amelyet a rendszer összehasonlítja a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> hívásakor meghatározása

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` matches the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package defined in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> is used to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Ha a `packageUri` <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>egy <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>hívás, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore>a kért modultípusra eléréséhez használt</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> meghatározott a csomag</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> megfelel

trans-unit.source: If the `packageUri` does not match the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A> for a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> call, the package with the specified URI is opened to access the requested part.
trans-unit.target: Ha a `packageUri` nem felel meg <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest>hívás, a csomag a megadott URI-azonosítóhoz már meg van nyitva a kért modultípusra eléréséhez</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest> a</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Biztonsági megjegyzés** ezt a módszert, követelményeket <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>az összes egyéni <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>(nem -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) típusokat.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>

trans-unit.source: The key [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the `package` to compare in a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A kulcs [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] , a `package` az összehasonlítandó egy <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The package to add to the store.
trans-unit.target: A csomag hozzáadása a tárolóhoz.

trans-unit.source: package is .
trans-unit.target: packageis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: packageUriegy érvénytelen csomag [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A package with the specified packageUri is already in the store.
trans-unit.target: A megadott csomaghoz packageUri a tárolóban már van.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Vissza a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> rendelkező egy meghatározott [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] az áruházból.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`az URI-azonosítók megfeleltetett meghatározott a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>metódus hívása.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Biztonsági megjegyzés** ezt a módszert, követelményeket <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>az összes egyéni <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>(nem -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) típusokat.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to return.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] a csomag való visszatéréshez.

trans-unit.source: The package with a specified packageUri; or , if a package with the specified packageUri is not in the store.
trans-unit.target: A csomag a megadott packageUri ; vagy , ha a megadott csomaghoz packageUri nem a tárolóban van.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: packageUriegy érvénytelen csomag [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from the store.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> rendelkező egy meghatározott [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] az áruházból.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` is matched to the URIs specified in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`az URI-azonosítók megfeleltetett meghatározott a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>metódus hívása.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore.AddPackage%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Security Note** This method demands <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission> for all custom <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> (non-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) types.
trans-unit.target: **Biztonsági megjegyzés** ezt a módszert, követelményeket <xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>az összes egyéni <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>(nem -<xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage>) típusokat.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.ZipPackage> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.EnvironmentPermission>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the package to remove.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] a csomag eltávolítása.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is an invalid package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: packageUriegy érvénytelen csomag [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
